title: Creative Mind and Success
description: Discover how "right thinking" can help you achieve success!This spirited guide by the founder of the international Religious Science movement will show you how to:• Attain strength and control thought• Attract friends and use the imagination• Achieve independence and prosperitySimple and direct, this manual will help you understand the nature of the universe and the creative power of the mind.
author: Ernest Shurtleff Holmes
